head.title: French Delicacies Are Just a Click Away (And on Sale)

hedline.hl1: French Delicacies Are Just a Click Away (And on Sale)

abstract.p: Frenchfeast.com is offering temporary discount of 10 percent (S)

block.p: Anyone who has visited Paris in summer knows how terrific the sales are, as shops get ready to go on their annual August vacations. The Web site Frenchfeast.com, based in New York, is taking a small vacation, too, but it is offering a 10 percent discount on orders placed on the Internet through Aug. 2. Items will be shipped after that date.

Anyone who has visited Paris in summer knows how terrific the sales are, as shops get ready to go on their annual August vacations. The Web site Frenchfeast.com, based in New York, is taking a small vacation, too, but it is offering a 10 percent discount on orders placed on the Internet through Aug. 2. Items will be shipped after that date.

The site lists an array of high-quality packaged foods imported from France, including traditional sweets like almond-flavored calissons d'Aix and twig-shaped chocolate sarments du Medoc, plus assorted mustards, vinegars and other condiments, pates, dried beans and rice.
